titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of in the visitation of the moste Reuerend father in God, Matthew, by the sufferaunce of God Archebyshop of Canterbury, Primate of all Englande, and Metropolitane in the yeare of oure Lorde God, M, D. LXIII.
Visitation articles. 1563
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1559-1575 : Parker)
Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
